sn22.151:4.2: “Kismiṃ nu kho, bhikkhave, sati, kiṃ upādāya, kiṃ abhinivissa:
sn22.151:4.3: ‘etaṃ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā’ti samanupassatī”ti?
sn22.151:4.5: “rūpe kho, bhikkhave, sati, rūpaṃ upādāya, rūpaṃ abhinivissa … pe …
sn22.151:4.6: viññāṇe sati, viññāṇaṃ upādāya, viññāṇaṃ abhinivissa:
sn22.151:4.7: ‘etaṃ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā’ti samanupassati.
sn22.151:4.8: Taṃ kiṃ maññatha, bhikkhave, rūpaṃ niccaṃ vā aniccaṃ vā”ti?
sn22.151:4.10: vipariṇāmadhammaṃ, api nu taṃ anupādāya etaṃ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attāti samanupasseyyāti?
sn22.151:4.17: vipariṇāmadhammaṃ, api nu taṃ anupādāya etaṃ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attāti samanupasseyyāti?
